resources.string: You can measure how elastic the crystalline lens is
You can measure how much your eyesight is
You can check your visual acuity with a short sight chart
You can check your visual acuity with a long sight chart
Children who do not know how to read can have a visual acuity test
Use the Amsler chart to check if there are any abnormalities in the macula
Use the M-Chart to check if there are any abnormalities in the macula
"All eye examinations in the 'NENOON' are self-examination and "
" so please visit a hospital and consult a doctor for an accurate diagnosis.\nTest results may vary depending on the condition of your eyes, surrounding environment, or device."
Presbyopia is an eye disease in which the elasticity of the crystalline lens decreases with age and the accommodative power is reduced.

The minimum visual angle at which the eye can distinguish two points is called the minimum visual angle, and visual acuity refers to how much this minimum visual angle is.\nA formal eye test is performed at a distance of 5m. This test can be measured at 3m or less.

The minimum visual angle at which the eye can distinguish two points is called the minimum visual angle, and visual acuity refers to how much this minimum visual angle is.\nA formal eye test is performed at a distance of 5m. This test can be measured at 3m or less.

The minimum visual angle at which the eye can distinguish two points is called the minimum visual angle, and visual acuity refers to how much this minimum visual angle is.\nA formal eye test is performed at a distance of 5m. This test can be measured at 3m or less.
If the macula, which is the focal point of the retinal nerve, is degenerated, the lattice pattern looks bent, blank, or black.
Refractive error occurs when the retina cannot focus accurately, and is corrected with glasses by distinguishing between nearsightedness and farsightedness.
Please proceed after confirming the test order
Touch the screen to start eye test
Cover your left eye\nand test your right eye
Cover your right eye\nand test your left eye
Press Start and then\nfix the distance between the device and the user.
If the measurement distance changes during the test, the value of the eye examination may change.
